kulami.connectivity

Class ServerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • kulami.connectivity.ServerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageObserver

    public class ServerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageObserver
    The ServerAdapter decomposes Kulami client/server protocol messages and delegates to the corresponding methods of an InProtocolObserver.

    ServerAdapter receives messages from a ServerProxy.

    Author:
    gordon

      • initMatchers

        private java.util.List<java.util.regex.Matcher> initMatchers(java.lang.String message)
        Given a server message creates a List of Matchers from the list patterns.

        The patterns list has to be initialized before calling this message.

        Parameters:
        message - the server message
        Returns:
        list of matchers
